The [[Agile Manifesto]] kicked this all off. See [[Defrauding the Manifesto]] for a history. We can perhaps summarise the spirit with some of the original words:

- __Individuals and interactions__ over processes and tools

- __Responding to change__ over following a plan

story.text: [[Agile Project Management]] or [[Agile Management]] is an iterative and incremental method of managing the design and build activities for any new product or service.

The term refers to a group of software development methods in which requirements and solutions evolve through collaboration between self-organizing, cross-functional teams - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Agile_software_development wikipedia]
It promotes adaptive planning, evolutionary development, early delivery, continuous improvement, and encourages rapid and flexible response to change.
The [[Agile Manifesto]] kicked this all off. See [[Defrauding the Manifesto]] for a history. We can perhaps summarise the spirit with some of the original words:

- __Individuals and interactions__ over processes and tools
- __Working software__ over comprehensive documentation
- __Customer collaboration__ over contract negotiation
- __Responding to change__ over following a plan
That is, while there is value in the items on the right, we value the items on the left more.

YOUTUBE 1r-BNaR_TDc
Waterfall vs Agile...purchase the complete Guerrilla MBA from [http://www.clickok.org - clickok.org]
A particular form of agile is [[Scrum]], named after the practice of short daily standup meetings.

YOUTUBE XU0llRltyFM
This video is an introduction to the Scrum software development methodology. By the end of this fast-paced video, you'll practically be a scrum master. You'll know about burn down charts, team roles, product backlogs, sprints, daily scrums and more - [https://www.youtube.com/user/axosoft?v=XU0llRltyFM youtube.com]
